And… Done!

Way to go! A few quick reminders:

  • Make your first post now for your
    new group members to interact with.

  • Make posts actionable, valuable,
    engaging, and periodic     - no one
    wants to be spammed.

  • Encourage members to be active in
    their public communities too.

  • Be open, honest, and real - this
    builds trust and community and
    delivers better results.

  • We always welcome your feedback, ideas,
    and suggestions     - so reach out!
